entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inconsistent casing of Configuration msbuild property when ArtifactsPath is set and unset #45026
  • dotnet watch 9.0 regression: killing process without further information #45024
  • dotnet watch reloading of razor class library CSS has regressed in 9.0 #45011
  • APICompat is failing when being used with desktop msbuild #45004
  • unexpected control chracter output from dotnet run #45002
  • GenAPI formatting of enums #44999

Closed

  • dotnet test command does not respect case of --configuration when using --artifacts-path #44991
  • .NET SDK 8.0.404 ignores `<EnablePreviewFeatures>True` in dotnet build #44985
  • When i use "dotnet publish" to generate osx-arm64 binary file on my win-x64 pc. I get an incorrect format file. #44359

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-alpha.1.24571.1 #45027
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use temp directory as TestExecutionDirectory in RunTestsOnHelix.sh #45022
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use managed Mach-O signer on non-Mac hosts #45019
    area-Host, untriaged
  • Update vs-solutionpersistence to 1.0.23 #45018
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Use the static factory for creating a logger #45009
    untriaged, Area-CLI, DO NOT MERGE
  • Disable VMR updates for `dotnet/scenario-tests` #45005
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add implicit reference to `Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Internal.Assets` #44997
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Using ConsoleLogger to prevent unexpected behavior #45015
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Allow nuget-client test binaries #44989
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines #45003
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Run all steps in a container #44969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Initial attempt at removing explicit #nullable enable in source #44936
    untriaged
  • Build installers on Windows in aspnetcore. #44828
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Move test templates to SDK repo #44417
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Improve globbing match performance #44159
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Enable test timeout dump collection #44730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Signing in Repos that Override Build Actions #44855
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support publishing of multi-architecture OCI container images #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • format: stop checking for dotnet cli version #44958
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make the toolsResolverCache path overridable using an environment variable. Fixes #11432. #43576
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Document for new feature
  • Add VMR leg that builds test projects #44843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2586303 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44963
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix: CLI Help missing package description #44954
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44990
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
